title: Release of Crewekerne Now Imminent
content: At Greater Alion Typefounders we've nearly finished work on our Crewekerne -our arts and crafts inspired Roman project, and will be releasing it very soon. Along the way it's grown into three related families and 21 faces! We've just uploaded a preview of near to release versions of all 21 to our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015205149/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).
author: Rasendyll
